content: Hi there folks - I've noticed there is a link to the FAQ doc on GitHub. Should we also be translating that document, so they are properly linked to the translated survey?
Yes if you look at the english version it has been updated to reflect the new link (and some new text) - retranslating that block of text is the way to go
Yes, the translation is pointing to the main github document already, but it's pointing to the English version. Should we send PRs to translate the FAQ itself?
